original_text: Truly, truly, I say to you, a servant is not greater than his master, nor is a messenger greater than the one who sent him.
korean_text: 내가 진실로 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 종이 주인보다 크지 못하고 보냄을 받은 자가 보낸 자보다 크지 못하나니

sentences.original_text: a servant is not greater than his master,
nor is a messenger greater than the one who sent him.
sentences.korean_translation: 보내심을 받은 자도 보낸 이보다 크지 않느니라.
